p: My impression is that the paper is highly sophisticated in terms of analytics, but that the data sources that are used to describe influenza and the possible drivers (such as weather, mobility) are not always well developed and ill described (Truwen) or even possibly inadequate (Twitter). The findings of short-distance traveling being important driver corroborates findings by Gog et al., another pioneer study using medical claims data to study influenza dissemination, which is nice.
